tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is very caring and expertise in his work. He cares for each and every kid.. he is also available 24*7 on WhatsApp as well as over the call.. always ready to help.. I truly appreciate his care and expertise and very grateful to know him in person too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Most recommended üôÇ
As most parents i think, we tend to get hyperactive at times and bit under panic mood with simplest fever

Doctor was patient with my queries
His consultation was clear and precise
He mentally cooled me down for my babys fever
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: This was our first vedio call to any doctor. Was bit worried, how will it work? How will I explain to doctor.? etc. But trust me when I started my conversation with doctor I didn't even realise that we are having video call. He understood the problem very well and gave valuable advice and prescription. I will highly recommend. May Allah bless him.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words mam. I am glad I could help you well online. Happy to help always. Stay safe and healthy.

tags: None
review: Me being the first time mother, am mostly hyper worried and get easily paranoid about anything and everything that goes off track wrt my son. Consulting Dr. Rahul gives me a sense of calm as he explains everything very nicely and his priority has always seemed to be child's comfort and happiness. So all his advice comes from the perspective of keeping the child healthy in the best possible way and without depending on medicines which works for me. I am happy with his consultation results.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rahul is very friendly and has happy to help attitude.
He explains everything related to child's health, growth, etc very calmly.
He is easy to reach out whenever we need his expert opinion.
Hospital staff is also very friendly and helpful.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable Feedback Mam .

tags: None
review: Good behaviour and politely explanation of issues with probable cure. Nearby location for people from Bhayandar and Mira road
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Very Pro active, and very specific in asking the queries to understand symptoms
Prescribed the medicines
In all, very convenient and hassle free consultation 
Thanks Dr.Rahul
reply_text: Thankyou for your kind words. Mam means alot!

reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

review:
Wonderful experience with Dr. Rahul Shukla was a wonderful paediatric doctor and the staff was always helpful and kind. I am so glad I chose (Shiv Om Hospital ), now my baby is feeling good, and would highly recommend to anyone.


Thanks Doctor üôè
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words sir.

review: Dr was helpful n way of explanation was very good n easy to understand..... Not talking unnecessary gave proper information abt feeding..... 100% recommended
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words sir. I am glad I could help you well
